website_summaries.verdict: Rugged design on this High Bounce and height adjustability lets this scooter grow with your kids.
pros: Fun and useful for all ages
Twist & Stow folding system makes it easy to fold up for storage or transport
cons: Length of brake line limits how much the height is adjustable
Front post is not adjustable, as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Product description inaccurate; front post is not adjustable. This is only for short children.
customer_reviews.text: Product description not accurate. At time of purchase, description said it had a telescoping (adjustable) front post. It doesn't. Prior to returning the product, I double-checked the description and found that we had read it correctly and the product information was incorrect. Returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: TeenieGirl

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed watching my kids all play together for some Scooter fun. Different type of scooter
customer_reviews.text: fun family friendly scooter for all big kids! Very durable and strong. It's very safe and easy to store and open up to play with. Has a lightweight design but it doesn't take away from the durability and safety. My son loves to play on this for hours on end. I finally can get my son to do chores so he can go outside and ride it in the neighborhood. I'm very happy with this scooter as well as my son; he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyReviews4fun

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it's OK...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because all in all it is a pretty cool scooter, however it doesn't work well for older kids and dint come as described /pictured. My son is 10 yo, 5', and 110 lbs. and it is too small for him. The scooter is not adjustable as I had hoped, is very short and did not come as described. The brakes are finicky and the scooter goes fast, which requires good working /always working brakes, which is a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cullum

customer_reviews.title: Kids seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: Kids seem to like it. Move thighs apart and together to go, hard to get the hand of at first. Not sure how long it will hold up, but has been fun first few days. Does best on flat surfaces
customer_reviews.author: J. Aguglia

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust handle heighth
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr. old grandkids love this scooter; however, the handle can't be raised to adjust to a child's height and consequently, they bend over. If handle adjusted higher, it could be used for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it! This was her #1 gift for Christmas and she loved it! Very easy to put together, little assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter. Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: We keep all types of driveway riding toys for 3 grandkids. She’s 4-12. This is adult sized as well and we all enjoy. A very smooth riding svoiter
customer_reviews.author: Edie Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Green is different than others
customer_reviews.text: This green scooter was nothing like the pink and blue one I ordered. I thought they would all be the same but the ordakng mechanism was totally different than the others so read the description well before ordering, I had to send it back, my 8 year old son could not control this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great item for hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when it was put together that it was too small for my ‘tall’ 9 year old grandson. However, it turned out to be just what he wanted, Many hours of fun and exercise !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Granddaughter loves it. Now that she's older her older sisters have one that I purchased for them selling all three love them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine s.

customer_reviews.title: Good times
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old granddaughter loves it. I tried it before I gave it to her....fun ride!!
customer_reviews.author: Lammy

customer_reviews.title: grandson loves it, and watching them ride it was fantastic
customer_reviews.text: it arrived when said, went togeather very easy! My grandkids loved it
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was amazed when she opened this on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was amazed when she opened this on Christmas. Has not stopped riding since she got the hand of it immediately too!!!- I love that it breaks down for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: R.⏳

customer_reviews.title: Fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but my grandkids still ride it
customer_reviews.author: Angela Curry

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters love it. Bought 1 for 1st granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters love it. Bought 1 for 1st granddaughter, and every time the other 2 came over they wanted to ride so I bought 2 more. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Austin

customer_reviews.title: Cool!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted it so bad and we couldn't find it in stores in our area. And the color pink, cool. It's safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: Time spent with your daughter. How wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter. She love it , her father love it too fun together.
customer_reviews.author: Happy older woman

customer_reviews.title: and has had an easy time riding it
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this, and has had an easy time riding it, and she is not athletic at all. All the neighborhood kids ride it too-from 5 years old to 10 years old. It has held up well. Just remember to tighten the front bolts often.
customer_reviews.author: thaina mark

customer_reviews.title: Description was not detailed enough
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this green scooter. I thought that it was like the blue one where the y part was stationary. However this one is not like that. This one is more difficult to use then the blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Binkley

customer_reviews.title: Easy gliding and
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it. Easy gliding and turning
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun! Was purchased for granddaughter but I ride it too! Everyone who tries it loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Great product...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew, he loves it. Even i got to play with it but not as good as him, great product plus keeps kids active in a fun way...btw his 6yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: noe valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. It was the hit of her birthday party. Easy to put on the handles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with the grands for Christmas. Not so much for grandma and her gravity check!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Farroll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 year old son and very light weight!!! He loves this scooter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but kept it as a Christmas gift anyway
customer_reviews.author: library

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son, he really enjoys it, easy use.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and young adults as well!
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter who is 4 years old is a natural on this scooter and it is a wonderful toy. Her older brother and cousin have one and we couldn't keep her off it so we bought her one for herself. We saw it when we were camping and the kids got to try it! Adults were trying it out as well they are very sturdy and can hold up to like 180 lbs.Best present!
customer_reviews.author: EBandy

customer_reviews.title: Son and his pals love this
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old would not get off this. When his friend came over he wouldn't get off either. I actually hopped on it myself. It's fun! It glides really nicely and I like the fact that it is actually quite hard to tip over on it. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday she loves it and so does the kids in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! However, do not turn sharply on a hill!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Lots of FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter bought this for herself and loves it. Easy to ride and is on it daily. It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: K-RAN

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old daughter loves this scooter! She zooms all around the neighborhood with it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TJE18

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Really fun toy. The only one like it in the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME! My son LOVES this as do I!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Myers

customer_reviews.title: It has become her favorite outdoor toy so it gets a lot of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday and she loves it! It has become her favorite outdoor toy so it gets a lot of use. She also shares with her friends and it still rides well and looks great. I am very pleased with this purchase. In fact, my older daughter wants one too.
customer_reviews.author: Buppiemommie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: A little small for my 11 year old (who is really tall for her age) but fit my 5 year old perfectly. Both of them LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Toomsen

customer_reviews.title: They are totally fun. At least a 6 star product
customer_reviews.text: Every child NEEDS one of these. Doesn't matter if they are 4 or 44. They are totally fun. At least a 6 star product!
customer_reviews.author: Shirlyn T.

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love these (6 and 8) They go fast enough their ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love these (6 and 8) They go fast enough their mother can run while they ride them. Great exercise for them. Even their parents ride them.
customer_reviews.author: barb sweet

customer_reviews.title: Missing a bolt on the right side
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this scooter but I just noticed now that the right side of the leg is missing a bolt to lock in. Is it possible for the company to send me it so my kid can ride it safely? I already threw the box away that it came with. .is it possible for the company to contact me about this issue 😕
customer_reviews.author: KING GODZILLA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He rides it as much as he can.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed,  Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money I bought the black and red one for my son's 7the birthday and did not open it until he did on his birthday and when he opened it his first responsw was " i hate it "when he saw it was white, I was also shocked. It said " hi bounce" on it not "Streeter " lije it shouls have based on rhe picture online, look cheap ! Smaller size than others I've seen. DISAPPOINTED! When I called to return it Amazon will take it back but did not even offer me a correct replacement as it is not their direct item that they sell. Picture is what I received when I ordered the black-red one
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: High Bounce Y Slicker 3 Wheel Wiggle Drift Scooter - Great Outdoor Scooters for Kids and Adults, Foldable
feature_bullets: Y Scooter Measures 32" Tall and Features a three wheels design which enables ultimate speed by shifting your weight from side to side and never touching the floor!

No Need to Touch the Floor! This double leg scooter is driven by simply twisting your hips and pushing down through your two legs. Super Easy for Adults and Kids to Ride. This Y Slicker Scooter can reach top speeds of up to 15 miles per hour
Ride it Anywhere! Will Drive Seamlessly on Any Surface from Smooth Paths to Bumpy Roads and Hills. Fold it up and take it with you on the Road!
Foot Bars are Flexible in order to allow for Sharp Turns and Extreme Stunts! Built-in quick response hand brake offers increased control and safety
A Reinforced and Light Weight Steel Frame Makes it Easy for Boys and Girls of all Ages to Handle, yet is sturdy enough to last for years
